metadata.title: SoraFlows - Advanced Video Editing and Generation Tool with OpenAI
metadata.description: SoraFlows is an open-source WebUi platform for users to easily create Advanced Video with OpenAI's Sora model.

homepage.introduce: Sora, the most advanced language-to-video model.
homepage.introduce_2: Start here, join us, and begin using it.
homepage.pDescription: SoraFlows is a video generation platform that uses the most advanced language-to-video model, Sora, to generate videos from text. It is a powerful tool for creating videos for marketing, education, and entertainment.
homepage.email_lint: Please enter a correct email address

pricing.title: SoraFlows Pricing | SoraFlows
pricing.description: SoraFlows pricing, SoraFlows is an open-source platform that enables users to easily create videos from text, images, and audio using OpenAI's Sora model. | www.soraflows.com

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy | SoraFlows
privacyPolicy.description: SoraFlows is an open-source platform that enables users to easily create videos from text, images, and audio using OpenAI's Sora model.
privacyPolicy.desc: Thank you for choosing SoraFlows! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website located at.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pa: a. Personal Data: When you use SoraFlows, we may collect your name, email address, and payment information for order processing.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pb: b. Non-personal Data: We may also collect non-personal data through web cookies to enhance your browsing experience.
privacyPolicy.h4_2_p: We only collect your personal data for order processing.
privacyPolicy.h4_3_p: We do not share your personal data with any third parties.
privacyPolicy.h4_4_p: SoraFlows does not knowingly collect any personal data from children.
privacyPolicy.h4_5_p: We will notify users about any updates to this Privacy Policy via email.
privacyPolicy.h4_6_p: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us via the following means:

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service | SoraFlows
termsOfService.description: SoraFlows is an open-source platform that enables users to easily create videos from text using OpenAI's Sora model.
termsOfService.desc: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of SoraFlows ("Service"), provided by SoraFlows ("we" or "us"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsOfService.h4_1_p: SoraFlows provides a browser interface for OpenAI Sora, allowing users to easily generate text-to-video.
termsOfService.h4_2_p: The ownership of videos generated from text belongs to the original user.
termsOfService.h4_3_p: SoraFlows owns the usage rights of videos generated from text.
termsOfService.h4_4_p: We collect and store user data, including names, email, and payment information. We process these data according to our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_5_p: We use web cookies to collect non-personal data. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_6_p: Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. By using our Service, you agree to our Privacy Policy, which can be found at the following URL
termsOfService.h4_7_p: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United States.
termsOfService.h4_8_p: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify users of any significant changes via email.
termsOfService.h4_9_p: If you have any questions or concerns about our Terms of Service, please contact us:

tools.title: Sora AI Video Generation Tools | Comprehensive Multimedia AI Tools
tools.description: Explore the powerful video generation tools and multimedia AI toolset of Sora AI, easily creating high-quality videos, audio, and images, providing unlimited power to your creativity. | www.soraflows.com
tools.h1: Sora AI Video and Multimedia Generation Tools
